DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate new endoscopic technique lumbar spinal canal decompression .
DOC.detailed_description: 104 consecutive patient suffer neurogenic claudication include study . Patients operate use irrigation endoscopic decompression technique . Mean Follow 28 month Primary outcome measure assess use Oswestry Disability Index [ 19 ] modify Macnab Criteria All statistical calculation do use computer program SPSS ( Statistical Package Social Science ; SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL , USA ) version 15 Microsoft Windows
DOC.criteria: 1 . Neurogenic claudication radicular leg pain without back pain , and/or neurological deficit 2 . Symptoms sign correlate moderate severe spinal canal stenosis show MRI . ( Degenerative congenital bony stenosis include ) 3 . Failure 3 month conservative treatment 4 . Grade I degenerative spondylolisthesis degenerative scoliosis 1 . Segmental Instability 2 .
